actions.name: Nocturnal
actions.description: Effect: At night, the user deals 10% more damage with its attacks and takes 10% less damage. In Gloomy Weather (day or night), the user instead deals 25% more damage, and takes 25% less damage.

system.description: Effect: At night, the user deals 10% more damage with its attacks and takes 10% less damage. In Gloomy Weather (day or night), the user instead deals 25% more damage, and takes 25% less damage.
